nodes.text: The Valarian Outpost was an outpost on the Outer Rim world of Tatooine used by the criminal organization known as the Valarian gang during the time of the Galactic Civil War. It was located a short distance northwest of Jabba's Palace. Circa 1 ABY, Reelo Baruk hired a spacer to attack the Valarians in their camp because of the rivalry between Hutt crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure and Lady Valarian.
The Valarian Outpost was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
